title: Today's a Good Day for a Warm Bento

text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer. 
Is it lunchtime?
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Indeed it is. I made it when I was fixing breakfast.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: A bento that Wonder Acute made. My head ran imagining what the contents of her bento could be, but then—

Trainer, if you haven't eaten yet, 
would you like to eat this together?
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Of course. I made a lil too much today and if you ate some of it, it'll make me really happy.
choice_data_list: Okay then, thank you for the meal.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Okay then, thank you for the meal.
text_block_list.name: Senior Trainer

text_block_list.text: Oh my! Are you sure you're fine with staying with lil ol' me?
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: If it's the bento, we can always eat together another time, there'll be plenty of opportunities. You should go with them since they invited you.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: No way I was leaving. I was happy they invited me, sure, but I already agreed to have lunch with her, so I told them—

Ah, gotcha gotcha. You already had prior plans. 
Alright, next time it is!
text_block_list.name: Senior Trainer

text_block_list.text:
A bacon and cheese sandwich and meatloaf— 
Looks like Wonder Acute whipped up a homemade western-style bento today.
It was difficult to choose between them, but first, I stuffed my face with the sandwich. A thick cut of bacon with tomato on savory rye bread, they all worked well together.
My, oh my… I'm pleased to see such a happy face. Have some black tea as well, deary. It'll be nice and warm since I kept it in a thermos.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: I sipped the black tea. The gentle aroma of the tea leaves wafted into my nose.

For dessert, I prepared a cherry pie. 
You can eat as much as you'd like.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
Phew～, we sure ate our fill, didn't we. 
Also… the sunlight is peaceful…
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: A day like today is perfect for a lil nap basking in the sunlight.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: (Chirp Chirp)
Aw, it's a little bird. Oh, are you making a nest right there? Your little ones seem to be doing well as well.
choice_data_list: I hope they grow up big and strong.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Thank you for going out of your way for this. I'm sorry I made you turn down an invitation for me.
choice_data_list: No, I wanted to do this, so it's okay…
No, I wanted to do this, so it's okay…
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
Fufu… you don't need to over do it. 
You really are someone who's considerate.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Since you're like that, I've always been #1 in your mind, right? If I think about it, it's always been like that ever since we met—
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Immediately finding a pecularity and recommending a stretch for it—
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Paying close attention to my condition, making training regimens that perfectly suit me—
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: You're such an amazing person, that I can't help but think of myself as the luckiest gal on Earth.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: But, it's okay to value your own pace more, okay?
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: It'd make me very happy if I could see you take it easy for once.
choice_data_list: But, I haven't been over doing it—
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: (Ding dong Ding dong)
Oh dear, is it that time already? I'll see you again after school. So don't overwork yourself, okay.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: I wanted to clear up this misunderstanding with her, but I was also happy that she was so concerned for my well-being.

I wasn't going to press the issue further, but hopefully she'd come to understand it naturally with time… 
That's what I thought at the time.
